title: Literary Argument - keeps or reveals a secret

content.question: In well-written essay, analyze why the character keeps or reveals the secret and how that decision contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In well-written essay, analyze why the character keeps or reveals the secret and how that decision contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
